Name: Viking Days
About the game: Are you ready to be a Viking? How long can you survive the Viking Days? The ultimate Viking simulator trains you until your beard can reach the floor. Be challenged by every day normal situations of a Viking! Inspired by games such as WarioWare and Job Simulator, interact with the environment and be a REAL VIKING! 10 ULTRA REALISTIC VIKING DAYS! Forge Swords Drink Beer Target Practice Defend from Arrows Run from Giants Face the Dragon Cross Bridges Sharp the Axe Keep the Rythym Burn Ships *More mini-games to be added Available for Arcades on SpringboardVR
